item.title: Scientology
item.description:
We were at an indoor Scientologist theme park of sorts, very 90s. Verdict was that they were not terrible at designing rides and games. They had this “key” system where you’d earn these strange items by completing rides and learning scientology related lessons. they snuck these keys into real video games (one I remember was Myst) and they had their own little motif that played when you found one. they weren’t really keys but a sort of oblong red polyhedron with a golden wireframe shape extruding from the long end, like an abstract key already stuck in a lock.

One of the rides near the beginning (which to us was the end, as we went backward through the park) was the “gay straight bar”. it was like a caged carousel with a bar in the center. they had an advertisement playing, with shitty 90s advertisement hip hop, and it explained the ride. the song went “gay bar!” and the riders booed. then it went “straight bar!” and the riders cheered, followed by a repeating “gay bar straight bar gay bar straight bar …” as the ride sped up the bargoers all stood up and held hands. it struck me as unusually progressive for a 90s theme park ride to address such topics

item.title: Bag
item.description: we accidentally put a plastic bag full of food over Dennis’ nose and mouth and leave it there for hours. he seems fine, but when I take it off he telepathically communicates to me that it was the most painful thing he has ever experienced

item.title: Downtown
item.description: I’m downtown, and the military is here. a woman is doing bag checks on the side walk. I walk the other way. army men in tanks are driving down the street. there’s a staircase up to the market, I take it. one of them stop me and do a pat down. they ask to look in my mouth, and find some plastic shit I’m anxiously chewing on. this confounds them and they consider if I’m on drugs, but ultimately let me go.

item.title: Ducklings
item.description: It’s a really cold night so I go out to check on the ducklings. They have blankets on top of their brooder plates and for some reason multi colored fairy lights are all around their enclosure. I notice one of the brooder plates fell off after Betty shows me and quacks.

item.title: Redwoods
item.description:
We’re in Northern California, at the redwoods. I’m with my friend who is a Japanese salaryman on vacation. We’re on a dirt road surrounded by massive beautiful sequoias. Nearby is the largest monster truck ramp in the world. My friend suggests we jump it, but I think we should start with a smaller ramp.

At a hardware store. It’s just me and my friend. I see something that interests me, a sort of bent glass tube behind a display case, and I press the button to summon an employee. An older man walks over in a dirty grey shirt, baseball cap and denim shorts. he asks if I want the item, but I changed my mind and say I only accidentally pressed the button. as I walk away, my friend presses it too. the employee walks to him, and his head twists all the way around, and a different face on the back of his head talks to him in japanese. I look to a hallway and see another person has entered, an overweight woman dressed like an Egyptian pharaoh. her fingers are bent in an impossible shape, like the claws of a bird or the body of a spider, but perfectly round such that they could cradle an apple in their resting position. I get the impression these people are human mascots.

item.title: Barn
item.description:
I’m in a barn… it’s dark. all I remember about this part.

I’m in a car as a passenger, on the highway. in front of me is another car, and a famous actor is getting it on with a woman in the back seat. the person I’m with sees this and is consumed by jealousy, as she thought they had something special.

I sat down to watch an old movie from my childhood (something like the wizard of oz though I don’t think it was that, nor any real movie) and the moment it started playing I began weeping and couldn’t stop, I was so moved by nostalgia.

item.title: Colony
item.description: Can’t leave shelter because there’s a giant insect bird that will swoop down and eviscerate us. A colony of these insects has a parasitic relationship with its own queen.

item.title: Bathroom Stall
item.description: There’s only one bathroom on this gigantic train, with only one stall. when it’s my turn, people are upset I am taking so long to pee. blood comes out, I try to ignore it.

item.title: Shooting Star
item.description: A shooting star outside my hotel, it’s so close I can hear it sizzle in the air and it crashes nearby in the forest. I take my phone and start to record its landing spot. it’s glowing faintly red. I hear screams and explosions and look up, still recording, to see dozens more shooting stars colliding into each other and raining down chunks of rock. I see another giant Earth in the sky. I run back into the hotel and the staff are ushering people somewhere. a man is crying and threatening suicide.

item.title: Footsteps
item.description: I’m in a spacious, plain looking building like a school or a hospital. I’ve got my field mic and I’m recording my own footsteps. I noticed some orchestral music was interfering with the recording, but I couldn’t find the source. I end up in a concert hall with the seats like bleachers in how steeply they ascend, nobody is in them. the whole concert hall is empty but the music is quite loud, and I’m trying to find the source. I walk up the stairs and I find at the top of them a door to another completely full concert hall where the orchestra is playing very loud.

item.title: VW Beetle
item.description: Traded in my car for a pink VW beetle installed with a red haired hologram anime girl. The whole process was annoying (I had to drive a bunch between cities) but I did finally end up driving it to dari mart on friendly street.

item.title: Fighter Jet
item.description: D is my therapist. he wanted to facetime me but I don’t have an iPhone. we call while playing a fighter jet dogfighting game. I can hear A yelling at a game in the distant background

item.title: Diner
item.description: watching the matrix on DVD. I get in trouble with the mob over a giant, expensive hash map, after B(?) introduces me to the boss. we confront him in the parking lot of a diner.

item.title: Devil
item.description: a dream about demonic possession and the devil, who looked an awful lot like joaquin phoenix as the joker

item.title: Dead End
item.description: accidentally drove my car onto an elevated train track in Philadelphia. it ends up in a dead end on the tracks, in the middle of the city, safe from being hit, but impossible to get back in and drive out. it faces a ramp that leads into a big body of water. the train goes right over it. we try to cooperate with the city to get it back out, but nothing seems to work. eventually we try a plan where N and I disguise ourselves as clowns and do a comedy routine to distract the passengers. we stall the train above the car, I exit and throw it off the tracks onto the concrete. everyone celebrates.

item.title: Garco
item.description: N(?) and i are escaping from revolution-era army men wielding rifles with giant bayonets. we enter a warmly lit cave and there is a wall of climbable blocks with letters on them. one of the rows of blocks spells out “GARCO”. as i start climbing, N is impaled by a bayonet through his back and out his chest, and he dies.

item.title: Cubes
item.description: weird little cubes on the inside of a woman’s closed eyelids fly outward, stretching her eyelids like a cartoon

item.title: Chaperone
item.description: in a plane on a school trip. our chaperone is power tripping and loudly, aggressively going over all his rules for the trip. we are at the mall/airport when I get sick of it and tell him to shut up we are all trying to study

item.title: Dog Trail
item.description: on a walk with dennis. I let him roam around the trail off leash. I decided to get on the bus and then meet up with him further along the trail, but I get distracted and a bunch of things go wrong. eventually I decide R probably found him and took him home. I bus home, and when I get there, a bunch of other white dogs are there but not dennis. these dogs belong to R’s dad who is visiting. I panic and run back outside leaving all the doors open. I begin yelling his name and other people do too, the whole neighborhood wants to find him. there are lots of other dogs being walked today. eventually I see him being walked around by someone else. Dennis is wearing a t shirt. I get the attention of the person who has him and I take him back home

item.title: Ice Cream
item.description: on the bus. then I’m at yia-yia’s house from my childhood. everyone is speaking in German. i execute a scheme to get everyone to leave using spicy food. yia-yia offers me ice cream. I’m touched.

item.title: Fight
item.description: I’m at the train station. for reasons I don’t remember I get into a fist fight with one of the people there. I beat him in front of his baby brother

item.title: Giants
item.description: giant animatronic animals roam the forest trails, most notably and dangerously the giant cymbal banging monkey. if they see you they will try to eat you, running through everything in their path, even rewriting history to get rid of anything in their way, even the trees. I find myself on the property of a slave owner’s ranch. it looks like he’s made a bad deal with someone, and now people have shown up to shoot and kill him.

I’m at the theatre, watching the new breaking bad reboot movie with adam driver. later I’m at S’s house. he asks me about the movie, and I say that it was boring, and I preferred the new aqua teen episode they showed which was really overwhelmingly, paralyzingly funny. I drop two arrowhead shaped pixels on the ground, and have a hard time picking them up; I keep pricking my fingers on them. S suggests we cut them in half with scissors, as they make a cool looking CD effect on the inside. S asks if he can log into my Xbox controller. I tell him the password is 6,000,000,000,000.

item.title: Train
item.description: security camera footage of a young woman hopping near the train tracks. she gets too close and is hit by the train. her left leg is separated from her body at the hip, spasming, and she screams. I learn that she died in this accident from a comment on the internet.

item.title: Tomato
item.description: patching my game… computerized dream world… involves a tomato and a glove… dream entrance ritual… nice man and woman there helping.... theme park ride through the mall, palm trees

item.title: Cover
item.description: I am commissioned to do the cover art for Yoshi’s Island. the result is a sea of eggs, with baby Mario sitting in the center slightly off to the right looking a little confused and staring at the viewer.

item.title: Train Station
item.description:
walking up the concrete steps to the train station. later, I’m doing a long trek through the desert in eastern Oregon between two forested landmarks, walking alongside the highway. I collapse on the ground. everyone is wondering what’s wrong and then C notices all my organs have fallen out, and some of them are coming out of my mouth. she calls 911.

walking up the steps at the train station, slowly. my body has been put back together but I’m unrecognizable. I look like they only haphazardly put my skin back on. I feel like the worst version of RoboCop. I have no mouth anymore, and my hands are little plastic toys that can make a finger gun gesture. my mouth protects my organs, so I need to protect my mouth. I walk by a woman in a similar condition. I make finger guns at her. as I walk the reality of my situation sets in, and it makes me very sad.

item.title: Brothers
item.description: it’s revealed I had two brothers who were given up for adoption at birth. one of them was named David Larry and the other was named David B. G.. I also learn of a third brother who died. this info is all shown to me on a paper document. upon learning about the last one I cried and my dad could not console me.

item.title: Robotron
item.description: Something related to school and Robotron 2084… don’t remember much. I recall having trouble answering a question and being made fun of for it.

item.title: Lights
item.description: we’re in someone’s old mansion. I notice how some of the lights glow blue or green, but never red, even as you turn the color dial. the other lights glow orange like sodium lights. I’m unsatisfied there are no lights that can be set to any color.

item.title: West Illinois
item.description:
we’re watching an 1800s period movie in class set near West Illinois, a small US-owned territory near Panama, and there’s a battle scene where one side uses giant rolling and sliding rocks. I notice the sliding rocks have an unusual inertia, they don’t seem to slow down. later in climbing/parkour gym class I ask how this is possible and nobody can give me an answer, not even the smart kid. everyone just accepts this as a natural property of large rocks.

when I’m at the airport, still nobody can answer, but it’s cool to see how they build the planes around the pilot seats right before boarding. the airport looks like a giant spacious warehouse, with escalators here and there to get to different floors.

item.title: Shopping Cart
item.description: I’m pushing a shopping cart the wrong way through marked pathways in a mall, even going down the up escalators (the flat kind) and vice versa. mechanics are talking about their cars in the background.

item.title: Stick Figure
item.description: G and I enter room #1 in the attic. the first one with a stick figure. it’s arranged like a living room. then we continue into room #2, with another stick figure. the light is off, it’s like a garage, with a short step down to the concrete floor. I’m very scared to enter it. G leaves out the back door, but I stay in room #2 with the stick figure. it’s posed like it’s sitting. from outside the door G makes fun of me, suggests I’m in love with it or that I’m sexually attracted to it. I return to room #1. R is in there, and she has to leave. she comes back in. she can’t see me because of copyright law, so we play a game of hide and seek. I see her slowly walking around the room trying to find me. her eyes dart around exaggeratedly and it disturbs me. she can’t see me at all, even with her eyes open.

item.title: Dragon
item.description: on a sail boat, we encounter a dragon from the white dragon clan (though he is light red). we strike a deal with him, and he agrees to help us on our vacation by having thousands of tiny dragons gather in the form of a translucent, bouncy VW beetle. we use it to drive to the beach

item.title: Space Coaster
item.description: Beavis and Butthead get on a roller coaster that takes them to space. I’m Beavis. the way we get off the spacecraft onto earth is a long orange extendable tube that you have to climb down. I get on it wrong and hit my head on the ground and everyone laughs.

item.title: For+
item.description: some kind of rollercoaster through a cave. R wants to take a trip to Mexico. later I’m programming with for+ loops. I’m unsure what the + does then I notice it increments the first element in whatever youre iterating. well that’s useless.

item.title: Six Wheeler
item.description: hanging out with E and other friends. she asks why all her exes have been rich. I ask if she is poor. she says no. I say that’s why. my head is in her lap. her friend shows up in a giant armored six wheeled vehicle. we load all our stuff into it and drive around town. this guy is awful at driving and keeps running into things, destroying property. we’re pulled over by a cop and interrogated on the spot

item.title: Magic Horse
item.description: I’m making a game where when you close your eyes you see (in monochrome, wide angle lens) through the eyes of your magic horse.

item.title: Hotel
item.description: at a hotel with B. eating at a diner booth table with him and his mom. I’m counting blocks of table on either side to make sure it’s properly asymmetrical. his mom is asked about the beds, it’s confusing and we lose the opportunity once we realize they are asking if we want to switch them out.

item.title: Egg
item.description: I am a child or multiple children. the children don’t want to play the game where everyone wears these unsettling ceramic masks. mine looks somewhere in between a wailing ape and a gas mask. it’s red with flesh colored ridges, thick and polished. we’re in a dark place. feels like a game of tag but worse. there’s a giant floating ovoid object that feels foreboding and erotic. everything fades away except this shape. it is awful and beautiful. pink with circular inlets of white. white text on it, alien script. looks like a giant keychain ornament, soft but not smooth, like silicone. I want to take it. I think I take it.

item.title: Junk Labyrinth
item.description: I’m escorting my girlfriend and some others down from the top of a giant concrete wall structure that looks like a castle. it’s part of a giant circular structure that reminds me of the labyrinth structure in the short story The Immortal. it’s filled with junk and debris. the atmosphere is tense, it feels like everyone is looking for a reason to mug or hurt us. descending a staircase, I make a show of levitating above the steps with my eyes glowing white to intimidate them. a long-haired, overweight man wearing a backward baseball cap says to the person next to him, “see, that’s what they do.”

item.title: Abandoned Mall
item.description: I am a young woman. my friends and I are in a large abandoned open-air structure like a mall with giant blown out windows. we come across a man who wants to trap us here. he says if we attack him, his dog will attack us and at least one of us will die. he eventually kills all of my friends, trying to trap me. I fight him. I bite off his ear. the sight of his blood makes me sick. I crush him between an angled metal cellar door and its frame.

item.title: Old Friend
item.description: after leaving S’s house, he says I should bring more of our friends instead of hanging out alone. he mentions K, and I say I haven’t seen him in years. Suddenly K shows up and we walk home together through the South Hills. it starts raining pretty bad and my shoes get soaked. A young girl has joined us and I want to protect her on the walk back.

item.title: Parking Lot
item.description: humanity loses to the monsters from the movie Arcadian. the last you see of us is running into the lake next to a parking lot

item.title: Baby
item.description: we grow our baby out of an orange pepper plant. it feels wrong to cook him on the stove until he’s nicely browned and fragrant but that’s just what you have to do, he won’t remember it anyway

item.title: Teacher
item.description: back to school. rude, bald teacher has us fill out a confusing form full of fields to initial with a partner, my partner is N. after class he makes a comment about how I need to stop scratching my crotch so much. I brush it off but I’m really embarrassed. walking out of school I start wondering what grade I’m in when I realize I’m 27.

item.title: Sports Car
item.description: sports car on the train tracks. it gets run over, people cheer because they hate sports cars. a woman exits the car looking confused. when I get closer and the paramedics arrive I realize it’s R. she seems like maybe she had brain damage or something. the paramedic asks her to tie her shoes and she starts sucking on her own big toe.

item.title: Hitman
item.description: I’m the assassin in a Hitman type scenario. I’m at a sort of crappy hotel. I’m really bad at my job and keep having to restart

item.title: Bus Driver
item.description: the street is crowded with dozens of buses arranged chaotically, not squarely in the lanes. I’m trying to find the one driven by my friend C, so I climb on top and try to walk across them until I find his, 504. hands reach out of the bus windows trying to bring me into them. when I get to C’s bus, it flips over, throwing me onto the ground

item.title: Climbing Game
item.description: I’ve made a climbing game set in a misty forest. you climb these thin vertical slabs of rock embedded in a hill arranged in a U shape. when you reach the top you let go and look toward the open side. you are presented with what would be a nice view, but it is occluded by fog.

item.title: Underground
item.description: obviously hostile creature (stone zombie?) waits until we get off the communal elevator to the bottom of the world to attack me. black haired female monsters with giant spike teeth. underground lake full of creatures trying to eat me. there’s a red rock

item.title: South Hills
item.description: saw a guy get hit by like 3 cars kinda like that scene in the postal movie. he (or i? ambiguously written) walked around and left. I found him in some guys basement, he tried to trap us there. I ran away? whole thing took place on a road in the hills surrounded by firs.

item.title: Cactus
item.description: a man undergoes increasingly worse torture as legal punishment for consensually performing a BDSM act involving a cactus and a girl

item.title: Homer
item.description: homer simpson discovers art in a corn field, and finds an artifact that lets him engineer with an extra dimension (writer’s note: i don’t remember what that is supposed to mean). a robot breaks out of his facility looking for him.

item.title: Mask Girl
item.description: my new gf got mad when I couldn’t tell she came to school wearing a mask of her own face

item.title: Cool Bike
item.description: I’m doing lines down the street on this crazy looking bike with clear plastic wheels. I’m grinding rails and people are watching

item.title: Mechanic
item.description: took my car to the mechanic and the mechanic was H and he stole the car and his name was actually W

item.title: Keychain
item.description: kid tries stealing my keychain right out of my hands

item.title: Astronauts
item.description: Gf and I are astronauts. I eject right at the furthest point I can, for safety concerns. she follows and compliments my initiative and observation.

item.title: Rogue Lovers
item.description: two laid back, eccentric adventurers (lovers?) take us aboard after our boat crashes into theirs and sinks. one recounts how they ended up trying to nab some rare cave spider silk and discovered there were more spiders in the cave than hoped. (writer’s note: cave spider silk is a material from Dwarf Fortress)

item.title: Monkey Mask
item.description: an actress is interviewed about her scene in a horror movie where she reacts to the serial killer wearing a freaky looking skin mask that gave him this weird big simian mouth

item.title: Facility
item.description: trying to work together with another guy to escape a facility with a sneaky, strong guy trying to kill us both

item.title: UFO Operator
item.description: which 2 UFO operators would you pick (featuring Ted Bundy)

item.title: Mecha Show
item.description: a show about kids who can mentally operate robot dinosaurs… it seems wholesome until my friend and I are caught by giant versions of my own t-rex mech and she is brutally killed

item.title: Edible Rock
item.description: an edible rock you crush into powder and use for “structural” parts of recipes

item.title: Magic Mud
item.description: small town in Oregon. built on an incline. surrounding it are giant beautiful hills/mountains and a thick layer of mist. gravity is skewed. nearby “dirt pits” where mud and dirt shifts and floats around in strange shapes. there’s a mountain shaped hill, at the top there is a crater shaped inlet with labyrinthine patterns of mud. from it a heavy vibration occurs periodically.

item.title: Tastes Good
item.description: I’m giving oral to [REDACTED FICTIONAL CHARACTER] and she tastes really good.

item.title: Birthday Card
item.description: aunt C(?) sends me a birthday card and it makes me cry

item.title: Hatch
item.description: there is a hatch outside my apartment that I want locked to keep someone out, but it won’t close all the way. the police and some construction guy show up and we talk about it. everyone is being too loud

item.title: God of Magic
item.description: I begin worshipping the god of magic. I meet this guy on the road talking about the trigonometric ratios. he asks at some point in this conversation if I’m a virgin. I say, maybe in this lifetime. i ask if he believes in magic. I have a basket of blue apples. I roll one down the sidewalk. then I throw another at the first. trigonometry bitch. he wasn’t looking tho. so we go inside. it’s my grandparents old house. S is there. she says wow that’s gorgeous. I ask if she is referring to my buzzed blue hair. she says no it’s two autistic people.

item.title: Mummies
item.description: mummies have spikes on the side so you can climb into their mouths which are at the top of their heads

item.title: Alligator Pistol
item.description: talked about a wearable gun on your thumb called an “alligator pistol”. looks like a tiny cannon

item.title: Car Accident
item.description: N has a mental break, gets my mom involved, and is injured in a car accident.

item.title: Nude Restaurant
item.description: I, R and another girl(?) sit naked at a restaurant. the other girl goes into the empty kitchen and makes us food using her breast milk. T shows up, wearing makeup, gives me a weird look, and leaves.

item.title: Sideways House
item.description: I try to sleep(?) in a sideways house but it looks too unstable. sure enough it crumbles. my mom walks through the wreckage to catch up with me, but we are both caught by fiberglass in the air which cuts our skin. R and I meet up with H, and end up flying to Japan. R says something like “now you can teach me about the culture here” and H is like “I am Chinese lol” and we both fly to China. H can’t leave China until a court decides he can. R (or H, I can’t remember) writes a sentimental blog post about the whole thing. As I’m preparing to fly back to the US, I realize that I might be boarding the plane incorrectly, by hanging on tightly to its exterior. I wonder if I will die.

item.title: Winners and Losers
item.description: T introduces me to a game he found on 4chan that he does every day. The goal of the game is to “parkour run” your way through whatever you can and complete objectives. e.g. T runs through somebody’s back yard and then through another house’s living room. teams are split into two: the Winners and the Losers

item.title: Stomach Wound
item.description: I shot myself in the stomach by accident. nobody will take me to the hospital

item.title: Bus Stop
item.description: dad, brother, grandparents, aunt and uncle all waiting at the bus stop to go to a wedding. Dad and I realize we forgot our wedding attire, so we run back

item.title: Bald
item.description: guy in my dream shaves his head bald because he wants to be more intimidating. “every villain in every movie is bald!” he’s got a figure that looks exactly like him, but in evil robes

item.title: Tape
item.description: “game of thrones” book 1 was a vhs tape titled LIL WAYNE: THE ESSENTIALS

item.title: Twitter Death
item.description: twitter user @B died and i learned from the account via a family member

item.title: Invader
item.description: playing a game like dark souls. I beat an invader who is wielding a whip. there is an enemy who looks like a smiling witch with a big head. I’m in some kind of a run-down cottage.

item.title: Play
item.description: N writes and “performs” a “play” in G’s history class (it really is just a video he plays on the projector). the script was really good when he wrote it but at some point along the production process it changed direction. it begins with him monologuing over footage of a fly on a dog’s corpse for twenty minutes. after that there is a white-on-black animated section about 3 kids who turn into different creatures and consume different media/foods (?) until it kills(?) them (gets fuzzy after this)

item.title: Meme Class
item.description: in high school. we’re learning about memes in social studies. D keeps entering the room but realizes it’s not his class

item.title: Computer Music
item.description: N was here, and took an ativan. I woke up in the dream, it was still dark and my computer was playing strange music, it sounded like backwards drums and droning noises

item.title: Hair
item.description: I had huge dyed scene hair and bangs. when I look in the mirror I have terrible dandruff and my scalp starts to separate from my head like a wig.

item.title: Missing School
item.description: I am about to go to school, but decide to miss the bus and have sex with R instead. we are interrupted because she is hungry(?) and needs to eat.

item.title: Hybrid
item.description: I beat someone in a game that looks like both GunZ: The Duel, and Roblox

item.title: Oxygen
item.description: I’m jumping around in low gravity at a gathering with my family, somewhere in the city, in a strange large building. I forgot to get my oxygen device so I’m holding my breath jumping around trying to find the exit, and I do just in time. I find my cousin C, who tells me he has been “de-brained and re-brained.” I don’t want to go back inside, because I’m covered in sweat.

item.title: Motorcycle
item.description: camera follows me in fixed steps. I get on motorcycle with the goal to near miss

item.title: Body Shot
item.description: I’m outside at a park in the city thinking about 7g(?), a new internet service where you buy bagged internet and pop a hole in the bag to let it slowly fill your home. the bags are like little Amazon prime packages. I’m thinking about how these might negatively affect people (you could choke/trip on the bags?) when a man talking to himself walks by. suddenly he pulls a gun and says “what it is white boy? 66 cents says I get a body shot!” I climb up onto the fence and bob up and down to make it harder for him to aim

item.title: Trail
item.description: I’m lying on my back, riding a skateboard down a trail

item.title: Racer
item.description: Played a racing game sort of like f zero. M2k angling is when you control a character underneath the floor

item.title: Laundry Girl
item.description: I pay a girl to do my laundry. She asks me out. I say no, because I have a partner already.

item.title: Live Wires
item.description: I’m fighting another robot. we fight by throwing live wires from our bodies onto each other’s main processing unit

item.title: Bedsheets
item.description: About to go climbing with G. But first, an attractive person cuts up bedsheets to preserve my soul.

item.title: Police Officer
item.description: I am naked, a child. A police officer who looks like Kamala Harris viciously beats and interrogates me in an alley. Nearby, I can see over the heads of pedestrians a red or green square indicating whether or not they are positive for COVID. The police officer is one of them. She infects me with the disease, since she is in such close proximity.

item.title: Red Rose
item.description: A masked woman. Another woman cries as new people phase in and out of reality next to her. We live in some kind of mansion with different sections… I can’t remember the significance. There’s a large foyer with golden marble walls, floors, pillars. Looks like the bank from the Matrix, but gold. I know the weeping woman cries because the people near her are being taken and moved somewhere else. She further descends into hysteria as a 2-year-old is taken from its mother. I am peeling an egg when I look at the masked woman, and I say, “Red rose. Red rose. Red rose.”

item.title: Sidewalk
item.description: After a false awakening, R and I go on a walk to the nearby market. This time we use the sidewalk on the right of the street instead of our typical left, but I don’t find that to be unusual. Whenever I look at her face, I can’t remember if she forgot to put on her shirt correctly, uncovering her chest. But when I look at her chest to see, her shirt is on correctly. I chalk this confusion down to not being on my medication.

item.title: Children
item.description: This town is in disrepair. On my bike ride my companion and I are accosted. We walk into a family’s house. They are very poor, and neglectful of their children. An infant shrieks and squirms in its mother’s arms. Another woman walks by and bludgeons it to death with a small hammer or mallet. There are simply so many children in this house. A formless baby, melted inside a teacup giggling. A young boy with no eyes, curious, walking around and puffing a disgusting mist everywhere. There are sacs and boils of substances I can’t name. Children who move like worms and bugs, cramped into the bathroom. The boy grabs my arm and doesn’t let go.
